name: The Baba Yaga
summary: The Baba Yaga is a PC horror game inspired by the original Slenderman game in which you play as a boy who is looking for his sister in the woods. Upon finding her locked up in a cave, you’ll discover the game’s objective– find the missing keys to save her. As you scour the forest, you will find yourself being followed by a dangerous, looming entity. The monster in this game is based on Slavic folktale about the ogress, Baba Yaga (Baba Jaga), who is known to consume children.
